responses: Salam! Internship ke mutaliq kya maloom karna hai?
Deadline 15 July 2025 hai.
Aapko AI Resume Analyzer project diya gaya hai.
Aap support@creovata.com par rabta kar sakte hain.
Aapka shukriya! Agar aur madad chahiye toh batayein.
Internship ki duration 6 haftay ki hai.
Haan, internship complete karne par aapko digital certificate diya jayega.
Ye ek unpaid internship hai lekin valuable experience aur certificate milega.
Task ya assignment Google class room ya email ke zariye submit karna hoga. Details email mein milengi.
weekly attendance  hojati ha live class ma
Aapke supervisor ka naam aapki email mein diya gaya hai. Agar nahi mila toh contact karein.
Aapke instructor ka naam Abdullah Khalid Khan hai.

patterns: kya kya project mil sakta hai?
responses:
Available projects hain:
1. AI Resume Analyzer
2. Fake News Detection
3. Electricity Bill Estimator
4. Financial Anomaly Detector
Aap k project ka nam ha
Chatbot system

patterns: AI Resume Analyzer kaam kya karta hai?
responses: AI Resume Analyzer ek tool hai jo resume ko AI ki madad se analyze karta hai. Yeh skills, experience aur formatting ko evaluate karta hai aur improvements suggest karta hai.

patterns: fake news detection project kya hai?
news fake hai ya real kaise pata chalta hai?
responses: Fake News Detection ek AI project hai jo news articles aur social media content ka analysis karke batata hai ke woh real hai ya fake.

patterns: electricity bill estimator project kya hai?
bill estimator kaise kaam karta hai?
ye AI bill kaise nikalta hai?
responses: Electricity Bill Estimator user ke input (appliances, hours, days) ki buniyad par AI model se units aur bill ka estimation karta hai.

patterns: stock ya finance ka analysis kaise hota hai?
responses: Financial Anomaly Detector ek AI system hai jo stock ya financial data mein unusual patterns ya fraud detect karta hai using unsupervised learning aur time-series forecasting.
Kripya specific project ka naam likhein, jaise 'Resume Analyzer', taake main uski details de sakun.
